preview: Thanks so much!  Sign up HERE to receive marketing from Novari Collective including information on our upcoming promotions!  Please note Novari Collective is closed from 5pm on Friday 19 December 2025

full_threads.body:
Thanks so much!

Sign up HERE to receive marketing from Novari Collective including information on our upcoming promotions!

Please note Novari Collective is closed from 5pm on Friday 19 December 2025 until 8am on Monday 5 January 2026. We wish all our clients and suppliers a wonderful holiday season with their loved ones.

Giulia Savoca

Digital Marketing Executive



+61 404 855 287



+61 2 9310 1611



giulia.savoca@novaricollective.com



Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019



NOVARICOLLECTIVE.COM.AU







The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party without the sender's written consent. If you received this by mistake, please reply and delete it to avoid recurrence.

Hi Giulia,

We’ve aligned the images so they are all the same size – everything should now look consistent on the blog page.

If there’s anything else you’d like us to adjust or if you have more blogs to upload, just let us know. Always happy to help!

Great, thank you so much 🙂

Can you kindly have the images lined up if possible so they are the same size:


Sign up HERE to receive marketing from Novari Collective including information on our upcoming promotions!

Hi Giulia,

Thanks for following up on this, and please accept my apologies for the slight delay in getting back to you.

Because this request involved altering the site structure to display 9 blogs instead of the standard 6, we wanted to take a little extra time to ensure the grid layout remained responsive and that the older posts aligned correctly with the new ones on both mobile and desktop.

I am happy to confirm this is now complete and looking great:
  • Blog Page (Now displaying 9 items): https://novaricollective.com.au/news/
  • New Article: https://novaricollective.com.au/news/2026-interior-trends-shaping-the-future-of-beautiful-liveable-homes/

We are ready for the other blogs you mentioned whenever you are ready to send them through!

Hi there,

Ticket Number is 182217, can you please update me on the ETA for this request?

Thank you
